xtc.lang.cpp
Class Syntax.Conditional

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Object>, Locatable
Enclosing class:
Syntax
public static class Syntax.Conditional
extends Syntax

A conditional. This class provides the internal, normalized representation of preprocessor conditional directives.

getTokenText

public String getTokenText()
Description copied from class: Node
Treat this node as a token and get its text. This method strips away any annotations, treats the resulting node as a token, and returns its text. User-specified classes must not override this method.

Specified by:
getTokenText in class Token
Returns:
The token's text.
See Also:
Node.strip()
